turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, You can help me by placing an order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, will do. which starbucks would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at Rockefeller Plaza in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you got it. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a grande iced vanilla latte with 2% milk to go.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem. your order of 1 grande iced vanilla latte with 2% milk from the starbucks at rockerfeller plaza in new york city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place it now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect go ahead and place it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed your order to go. it'll be ready for pick up in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it, thank you for your help.
